data.title: Permian Basin Area Foundation Announces more than $1.1 Million in Scholarship Awards – Permian Basin Area Foundation
data.text:
Midland, Texas (August 11, 2022) – Permian Basin Area Foundation is pleased to announce $1,103,891 in scholarship awards for the 2022-2023 academic school year.

The Foundation celebrates more than 360 scholars primarily from communities throughout West Texas. These scholarships were made possible by generous donors to the Foundation’s scholarship funds.

Since its inception, PBAF has awarded scholarships totaling more than $6.67 million to students pursing their higher education aspirations. Permian Basin Area Foundation is proud to provide services to these students and honor the donors’ legacies throughout West Texas.

Awards from the Foundation’s scholarship funds for the upcoming academic year are as follows.
